mdRecord.dcterms:description: The World Trade Center is a site for various buildings in Lower Manhattan, New York City, United States. The original World Trade Center was a complex of seven buildings. It featured landmark twin towers, which opened on April 4, 1973 and were until 1974 the world's tallest buildings. These were destroyed in the September 11 attacks of 2001. The other buildings in the complex were damaged in the attacks and eventually demolished. The site is being rebuilt with five new skyscrapers and a memorial to the casualties of the attacks. -- http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/World_trade_center [work]
